text: Ezɨ Iesus akar isɨn zuibar Judan gumazir dapanibav gei, “Gumazir mam wainɨn azenim oparigha an dɨvazim aghui. Egha wainɨn ovɨziba mɨrmɨramin itarim gukuigha pɨn ikɨ wainɨn azenimɨn ganamin dɨpenimɨn ingari. Egha a wainɨn azenim isa wainɨn azenimɨn ganamin gumazir mabagh anɨngi (eghtɨ me gɨn wain taba uam a ikaragham). Egha saghon igharagha ghu.(12:1) Nɨ wainɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghsɨ, akɨrangɨn itir Akar Mɨngaribar gan.
